kj8tvrn6Text:
Brintellix® improves everyday functioning as
reported by the patient*1,2
kj8tvrn7Text: Short term Long term
kj8tvrnaText:
*As measured by SDS; **5 mg and 15 mg doses were not shown to be statistically significant.† 5 mg dose is only recommended starting dose in elderly.2
FAS, full-analysis set; SDS, Sheehan disability scale.
kj8tvrnbText:
Brintellix® 10 mg and 20 mg** significantly improved overall patient
functioning at work, at home and socially compared with placebo at
eight weeks, as measured by SDS†
kj8tvrncText: WORK / STUDIES SOCIAL LIFE / LEISURE

Brintellix_31152951e6: Long term
Brintellix_31d5533218:
The effect of Brintellix® on everyday functioning observed in three short-term
studies was sustained and further improved for up to 12 months as assessed by SDS**2
Brintellix_31bf5f5c0e:
*As measured by SDS. **At 15 mg and 20 mg doses once-daily. This was a 52-week, flexible-dose, open-label extension study in patients who completed one of three randomised,
double-blind, placebo-controlled, eight-week Brintellix® trials. All patients were switched to 10 mg/day Brintellix® for
Week 1, then adjusted between 15 mg and 20 mg for the remainder of the study, but not down-titrated below 15 mg.
Of the 1075 patients enrolled, 1073 received at least one dose of Brintellix® and 538 (50.0%) completed the study.
FAS, full-analysis set; SDS, Sheehan disability scale.
Brintellix_31b134b69d: Mean SDS total scores in adult patients with MDD2

Brintellix_311b879e7f:
*As measured by SDS.
**At 15 mg and 20 mg doses once-daily. This was a 52-week, flexible-dose, open-label extension study in patients who completed one of three randomised,
double-blind, placebo-controlled, eight-week Brintellix® trials. All patients were switched to 10 mg/day Brintellix® for
Week 1, then adjusted between 15 mg and 20 mg for the remainder of the study, but not down-titrated below 15 mg.
Of the 1075 patients enrolled, 1073 received at least one dose of Brintellix® and 538 (50.0%) completed the study.
FAS, full-analysis set; SDS, Sheehan disability scale.
